name: Confetti Fall Animation
author: WPDeveloperr

sections.installation:
1- Goto Worpdpress Plugin Directory
2- Search confetti fall animation keyword
3- Install and activate the plugin
4- [confetti-fall-animation delay=”1″ time=”25″]
5- Use the above shortcode to include on any page of your website or blog
6- https://youtu.be/wpq-ItO53vo (For Demo)
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Added shortcode by button in page editing tools.
  • Auto add confetti button added.
  • Confetti some bugs are fixed.

1.2.5

  • Popup feature added.
  • Shortcode modified.
  • Background Image upload Option added.
  • add/remove option added.
  • add image by button from plugin option.

1.2.1

  • Some Popup bugs fixed.
  • Easy customization added.

1.2.0

  • A dashboard menu added.
  • A custom Popup added.
  • Updated shortcode and added new features.
  • Popup with confetti and without confetti option added.
  • Easy customization added.

1.5.0

  • A change with shortcode.
  • logo and banner updated.

1.1.0

  • Plugin created with basic Shortcode setting.
  • Use shortcode for animation falling.
  • No new update.
sections.description:
Confetti fall animation fireworks celebration plugin for your blog or webpage. Add a delightful falling confetti animation to your website.

How to Use

1- Goto WordPress plugin directory
2- Search for Confetti fall animation plugin. Install and activate
3- Activate the confetti fall animation on HomePage by clicking the buttn or
Use the shortcode [confetti-fall-animation delay=”1″ time=”25″] on any (individual) post or page to start a falling confetti animation.
4- Add shortcode by button in page editing tools
5- Enjoy the animation

Demo Video

Compatibility

Fully compatible with all page builder e.g. elementor, WPbakery, Divi, Gutenburg blocks. Add Confetti fall animation via Shortcode and enjoy.
